Package sophiabcrypt.forms

Class SbcLookAndFeel

java.lang.Object
sophiabcrypt.forms.SbcLookAndFeel
public class SbcLookAndFeel
extends Object
This class manage a collection of Look and Feel Java Swing themes, to apply in SophiaBCrypt. The colletions listed here are: FlatLaf - https://www.formdev.com/flatlaf/ - All Rights Reserved. IntelliJ Platform - https://www.formdev.com/flatlaf/themes/#intellij_platform_themes - All Rights Reserved.
Since:
January/2021
Author:
Cesar_Bianchi
See Also:
SbcEncryptor
